about_the_game:
World of Guns: U.S.A. guns Pack #1 includes 10 U.S.A. 3D models for interactive disassembly/assembly.
List of the models:
1. Kriss Vector SMG
2. Colt Walker
3. M79
4. S&W M&P
5. Harpers Ferry
6. M16 A1
7. Ruger Mark II
8. M1 Garand
9. Remington 870
10.Mossberg 500
detailed_description:
World of Guns: U.S.A. guns Pack #1 includes 10 U.S.A. 3D models for interactive disassembly/assembly.
List of the models:
1. Kriss Vector SMG
2. Colt Walker
3. M79
4. S&W M&P
5. Harpers Ferry
6. M16 A1
7. Ruger Mark II
8. M1 Garand
9. Remington 870
10.Mossberg 500

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
